开启后，2.4G和5G会使用同一名称，路由器会自动为终端选择最佳WiFi网络，如: Connect the 2.4 G and 5G under the same network name. The frequency will be switched automatically frequency depending on the signal or device type.
目前路由器拨号上网获得的多半都是动态IP，DDNS可以将路由器变化的外网IP和固: Very often, the Internet service provider when connecting to the network provide external dynamic ip address (Stream, Beeline/Corbina, etc.). The vast majority of users this is enough. However, in some cases (for network games to access your computer from outside), the required external static address. Provide this service, not all providers, and if granted, for an additional fee. To work around this problem, you can use DDNS technology, allowing to connect an external dynamic ip address and a permanent domain name. To use DDNS is completely free!
开启该功能后，需要您重新连接VPN方可生效，且智能分流功能将关闭。若开启后发现路: When you enable this feature, we require you to reconnect the VPN in force, and intellectual bypass function is turned off. If the router is turned on after opening the App remote access is abnormal, please turn off. You are sure to turn? Help to improve the translation, write in chat your text
路由器正常工作情况下建议使用系统升级检测进行升级，在当系统无法升级或需要降级到前: In normal mode it is recommended to use automatic updates. Manual updating is typically used to downgrade the firmware.
WiFi双频合一关闭，5G会默认使用2.4G相同的网络名称（加后缀_5G）和密码: Wi-Fi access points will be divided into 2 frequencies. 5G will have the name prefix.
当你需要通过VPN使用外网时，可以开启此功能保证小米路由器APP远程服务可用，其: When you need to use an external network via VPN, you can enable this feature ensures millet APP remote services are available to the router, disable this function in other cases. Help me to improve the translation, write in chat your text.
开启相册备份后，回家手机上的照片将自动备份到小米路由器上，无需担心手机空间存储不: Enable backup from your phone and not worry about the lack of free space on it or data loss.
路由器重启需要等待十几秒或更多时间，重启过程中将会断开网络连接，稍后将自动重新连: Rebooting will take some time. Be patient.
开启白名单功能后，将只允许名单中的设备访问管理后台，每次开启会将本机自动添加至白: When you enable the white list will allow you to access a list of the background control as soon as possible, each time you open the car will automatically be added to the whitelist.
请注意：升级将会使所有已连接设备的网络中断，升级过程中请勿断开路由器电源或关闭本: Note: the Upgrade will temporarily stop the operation of the router. During the process, do not unplug the router power supply and do not close this page!
恢复出厂设置操作会抹掉当前路由器的所有设置，建议您先进行配置备份再恢复出厂设置。: Factory data reset will erase all current settings of the router, we recommend that you configure a backup and then restore to factory settings.
升级过程大约需要5-8分钟，路由器指示灯重新变蓝后，可以通过miwifi.com: the Process can take 5-8 minutes. As soon as the led on the router turns blue, You will be able to visit his office.
开启DMZ功能可以将内网某一个设备的IP映射到外网，方便从外网访问到该设备。: DMZ (Demilitarized zone) is a network configuration in which publicly accessible servers are in a separate, isolated network segment. This concept ensures no contact between open for public access servers and other network segments in case of hacking the server. In implementing the concept of DMZ is a special role for the firewall, as it is responsible for carrying out the desired policy for the protection of local networks from the DMZ segment simultaneously maintain access to the DMZ. Due to the complexity of implementation is not recommended to apply the technology of DMZ, if you are not familiar with the principles of creation and operation of networks. The use of technology DMZ is not mandatory, but in most cases it is recommended that network administrators serious about security issues.
开启DDNS服务，添加服务，输入前一步获取的信息，保存并启用该服务。: To access the DDNS service, enter information, and sohraniti to enable.
备份路由器的配置，重新刷机或重置路由器后可以用来恢复。: You can create a backup of your router settings or restore from backup made earlier.
未检测到存储设备，请将USB存储设备连接到你的小米路由器: Not detected storage device, connect the USB device!
当前管理终端的MAC地址，可以手动更改为其他MAC地址: Current MAC address. You can manually switch to another.
可以通过添加服务地址来限定哪些服务流量会经过VPN: You can add a VPN service and choose which services will use a VPN
提示：以上设置可以在APP的“路由器设置”中调整: note: All settings can be configured under «router configuration»
当外网下载带宽超过50Mbps时，建议无需开启QoS功能: When the download speed is more than 50Mbps, it is recommended to enable QoS function
通过手机、电脑客户端，你可以随时随地添加下载任务: Manage scheduler downloads right from your phone.
经过检测，建议使用DHCP方式(系统自动分配IP地址): After testing, it is recommended to use DHCP (automatically assigned IP address)

安装手机APP，你可以用更酷的方式浏览照片和影片: Install mobile app for affordable luxury money files and videos.
您还可以通过拨打小米客服电话寻求相关帮助: You can also call the customer service center
通过DDNS服务商获得域名及账号密码信息；: Get the domain name and information about the account password through the DDNS service provider;
切换国家或地区, 等待自动跳转... 用时70秒: there Is a change in the region. The approximate wait time is 70 seconds!
优先保证浏览网页的网速，大图秒打开: page loading speed giving priority to surf the browser.
优先保证打游戏的网速，不卡顿不掉线: Priority is given to games that reduces ping.
检查失败，网络繁忙请刷新页面重试。: Test failed. The network is congested. Will try again later.
优先保证看视频的网速，高清也流畅: Improves the stability buffering HD videos on the web.
恭喜，您的小米路由器已恢复正常！: Congratulations, your router is back to normal!
